courses.title: Tabla
courses.description: The Tabla is widely used in classical, devotional, and popular music across India, Pakistan, and other parts of South Asia.

courses.title: acoustic guitar
courses.description: A wider neck, allowing for more finger space, which is important for intricate fingerpicking techniques.

courses.title: Tibetan cymbals
courses.description: Tingsha cymbals are made from metal alloys and produce a high-pitched, clear ringing tone when struck together.

courses.title: Drumming Mastery
courses.description: Master the drums with our comprehensive course covering all skill levels.

courses.title: Traditional African Drum
courses.description: The traditional African drum is a vital instrument in African culture, used for communication, rituals, and ceremonies.

courses.title: African Djembe Drum
courses.description: The African djembe drum is a traditional hand drum known for its deep, resonant tones and vibrant rhythms.

courses.title: Veena
courses.description: The veena is a traditional Indian string instrument known for its rich, melodious sound, often used in classical Carnatic and Hindustani music.
